Action.author: jjjjibm
Action.body: Hi Bret, I spoke to Morali, who did this issue: https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/4993 (FAB-1926) He says he has been discussing this change with you.

Action.author: jjjjibm
Action.body: Bret, FYI. Murali has offered to help us tomorrow.

Action.author: jjjjibm
Action.body: Bret, we have identified this issue as a duplicate of FAB2175. I'll close this one.
